snippet.title: Goonya Monster trailer
snippet.description:
Go on a Rampage in this Party Action Game with characters designed by THE popular illustrator「 #TeradaTera 」
『 #GoonyaMonster 』is coming to you soon!
ーーー
The character designer is Terada Tera, who has created illustrations for numerous music videos and trailers.
Unique and captivating characters fill the screen with their charm! Busters with their unique weapons and Monsters with their powerful skills, will bring so much fun to everyone who plays!

Steam page here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1662080/Goonya_Monster/
Remember to Wishlist!
Official page: https://gnmonster.mutan.co.jp/
Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/GoonyaEN
